Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to prohibiting firearms as prizes in a game of chance not organized by an organization of veterans, volunteer firefighters or a police benevolent association
Summary: Relates to prohibiting firearms as prizes in a game of chance not organized by an organization of veterans, volunteer firefighters or a police benevolent association.
LawCode: Amd ยง195-d, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting firearms as prizes in a game of chance not organized by an organization of veterans, volunteer firefighters or a police benevolent association
